meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: A bomb killed the top official in the Indian state of Punjab and 12 others, including at least three members of an elite security force. Sikh separatists were suspected. Page A7. Medicare, From the Masses

At an emotional meeting in Indiana, people told their congressman of their battles with bureaucracy and their frustration over rigid eligibility rules for Medicare. Page A20. Retailers Post Weak Sales
Many of the nation's large retail chains have reported lackluster sales for August, providing further evidence that economic growth continues to be sluggish. Page D1.
